vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.10.29;
son of: Jethro (H3503);
brother of: Zipporah (H6855) and Eliasaph (H0460)
§ Hobab = "cherished"
the son of Reuel, the Midianite father-in-law of Moses, also known as Jethro, and brother-in-law of Moses
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Reuel; madianita; ancestro de los quenitas
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
何巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "被珍愛的"
流珥的兒子, 摩西的岳父, 一個米甸人, 也稱作葉忒羅, 並且是摩西的內兄
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
何巴 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "被珍爱的"
流珥的儿子, 摩西的岳父, 一个米甸人, 也称作叶忒罗, 并且是摩西的内兄
